item.title: Shannon add a quote by Ben Johnson
item.description: "Drink to me only with thine eyes, And I will pledge with mine; Or leave a kiss but in the cup, And I'll not look for wine." -- Ben Johnson

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Jim Carroll
item.description: "That, I realized, is the great beauty of dreams: the devil may inevitably find a way to jerk you off, but you can always wake up before he makes you cum." -- Jim Carroll

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Hubert Selby Jr.
item.description: "Sometimes we have the absolute certainty there's something inside us that's so hideous and monstrous that if we ever search it out we won't be able to stand looking at it. But it's when we're willing to come face to face with that demon that we face the angel." -- Hubert Selby Jr.

item.title: Shannon add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "Hustlers of the world, there is one mark you cannot beat: the mark inside." -- William S. Burroughs
